definition: to create/to produce/to write/creative work/creation/CL:個|个[ge4]
to begin/to initiate/to inaugurate/to start/to create
to do/to grow/to write or compose/to pretend/to regard as/to feel/writings or works

sentences.english: Further Practice for Pairs ·Add a third speaker and create your own lines.
sentences.chinese: 加進圈外人，創作你們自己的對話。

sentences.english: Wen Yiduo ever sang highly of Liu's creation.
sentences.chinese: 聞一多曾高度評價過他的詩歌創作。

sentences.english: The fourth section analysis the literary work of people who walk into political field by examination.
sentences.chinese: 第四節分析評述科舉入仕之工商子弟的文學創作活動。

sentences.english: According to Mumford, man is free in artistic creation.
sentences.chinese: 人在藝術創作時是自由的。

sentences.english: This week I have been covering creative writing.
sentences.chinese: 本週我教授創作型寫作。

sentences.english: In a word, numerous factors contribute to the global character of Jia Pingwa's literary works.
sentences.chinese: 多種因素構成了賈平凹創作中的世界性因素。

sentences.english: This explains practical significance of imitative writing in the history of Yue-fu poetry development.
sentences.chinese: 這一創作行爲在樂府詩的發展史上具有重要的意義。

sentences.english: Looking at the artistic creations of Pan Li-hong gave rise to a series of thoughts.
sentences.chinese: 看了潘麗紅的美術創作，引發一連串的思考。

sentences.english: Purna Yoga is an improvisation of the traditional systems of Yoga.
sentences.chinese: 整體瑜伽是傳統瑜伽體系的即興創作。

sentences.english: "Wang Zhaojun" is one of Caoyu's famous dramas in his late years.
sentences.chinese: 《王昭君》是曹禺先生晚年戲劇創作的代表作之一。

sentences.english: Chapter Five analyses the creative features of new scenarios of Shanghai"s Peking Opera."
sentences.chinese: 第五章則是對上海京劇新編劇本創作特點的分析。

sentences.english: In 1979, the creation of wood" Bird Island".
Kelley, a critically acclaimed singer-songwriter, is due to release a new album in February.
sentences.chinese: 作爲創作型歌手的凱利將在明年二月發行新唱片。

sentences.english: Music or sound effects to bring out the best of your creations.
sentences.chinese: 音樂或聲音效果，以發揮所長，你的創作。

sentences.english: The childhood experience has great significance to Meijie's literary creation.
sentences.chinese: 童年經驗對梅潔的文學創作具有重要意義。

definition: inspiration/insight/a burst of creativity in scientific or artistic endeavor
(of a story etc) to unfold/to play out/to develop (a technique etc)/to enact/(logic) to deduce/to infer
to create/to bring about/to produce/to set (a record)
